title: Churchill's 'We Shall Fight on the Beaches'
description: A 60-second lesson on Churchill's 'We Shall Fight on the Beaches'.

hook.text: Britain was losing the war. Its army had just fled France. Churchill stood up and turned a retreat into a rally cry.

quiz.question: Why did Churchill use simple Anglo-Saxon words in his speech?
options: They are more visceral and emotionally powerful
